org.micromanager.data

Interface Annotation


  • public interface Annotation
    A Annotation is a container for mutable information that is associated with a Datastore. * Annotations are used for attributes like image comments and display settings that may be changed after the Datastore has been frozen.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Datastore getDatastore()
      Return the datastore to which this annotation is associated.
      java.lang.String getFilename()
      Deprecated. 
      this is an old name for getTag()
      PropertyMap getGeneralAnnotation()
      Return a PropertyMap of information stored by the Annotation that is not specific to any one image.
      PropertyMap getImageAnnotation(Coords coords)
      Return a PropertyMap of information stored by this Annotation related to the image at the specified coordinates.
      java.lang.String getTag()
      Return this annotation's tag.
      void save()
      Commit the changes to this annotation to disk.
      void setGeneralAnnotation(PropertyMap newData)
      Replace the data this Annotation has for the Datastore as a whole with the provided PropertyMap.
      void setImageAnnotation(Coords coords, PropertyMap newData)
      Replace the data this Annotation has for the specified Image with the provided PropertyMap.

    • Method Detail

      • getImageAnnotation

        PropertyMap getImageAnnotation(Coords coords)
        Return a PropertyMap of information stored by this Annotation related to the image at the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        coords - Coordinates of image to get data for.
        Returns:
        PropertyMap of data related to the image, or null if none exists.

      • getGeneralAnnotation

        PropertyMap getGeneralAnnotation()
        Return a PropertyMap of information stored by the Annotation that is not specific to any one image.
        Returns:
        PropertyMap of data related to the entire dataset, or null if none exists.

      • setImageAnnotation

        void setImageAnnotation(Coords coords,
                        PropertyMap newData)
        Replace the data this Annotation has for the specified Image with the provided PropertyMap.
        Parameters:
        coords - Coordinates of image whose data is to be updated.
        newData - Updated PropertyMap of data to be stored in the Annotation that pertains to the image

      • setGeneralAnnotation

        void setGeneralAnnotation(PropertyMap newData)
        Replace the data this Annotation has for the Datastore as a whole with the provided PropertyMap.
        Parameters:
        newData - Updated PropertyMap of data to be stored in the Annotation that is not specific to any one Image.

      • getFilename

        @Deprecated
java.lang.String getFilename()
        Deprecated. this is an old name for getTag()
        Deprecated function returning tag (which doubles as filename) for this Annotation.
        Returns:
        the tag for this annotation

      • getTag

        java.lang.String getTag()
        Return this annotation's tag.
        Returns:
        the tag for this annotation

      • getDatastore

        Datastore getDatastore()
        Return the datastore to which this annotation is associated.
        Returns:
        Datastore associated with this annotation.

      • save

        void save()
   throws java.io.IOException
        Commit the changes to this annotation to disk.
